    • Package <Unnamed>

      • Class AbnormalUsageAlertUI

        class AbnormalUsageAlertUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • alertArea
            JTextArea alertArea
            Read-only area showing the formatted list of abnormal usage alerts.

            To refresh the content later, call alertArea.setText(AlertCenter.formatAlerts()); on the EDT.

      • Class GenerateReportUI

        class GenerateReportUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • clearBtn
            JButton clearBtn
            Button to clear the report output and reset date fields to defaults.
          • endDateField
            JTextField endDateField
            Text field for the report end date (expected format: yyyy-MM-dd).
          • generateBtn
            JButton generateBtn
            Button to trigger report generation.
          • reportArea
            JTextArea reportArea
            Read-only area displaying the generated report text.
          • startDateField
            JTextField startDateField
            Text field for the report start date (expected format: yyyy-MM-dd).

      • Class MainDashboardUI

        class MainDashboardUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • meterId
            String meterId
            The authenticated user's water meter identifier used to personalize the dashboard.

      • Class RecordDailyUsageUI

        class RecordDailyUsageUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • messageLabel
            JLabel messageLabel
            Inline feedback label that communicates validation errors or success.
          • meterId
            String meterId
            The water meter identifier associated with the current user/session. May be null, in which case alerts use "UNKNOWN".
          • usageField
            JTextField usageField
            Text field for entering today's water usage in liters.

      • Class WaterMeterIDUI

        class WaterMeterIDUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • enterBtn
            RoundedButton enterBtn
            Primary action button to validate ID and proceed.
          • glassPanel
            JPanel glassPanel
            Glass-like foreground panel containing logo, title, input and button.
          • logoLabel
            JLabel logoLabel
            Header/branding labels.
          • meterIdField
            RoundedTextField meterIdField
            Input field for the water meter ID with placeholder and error states.
          • meterIdLabel
            JLabel meterIdLabel
            Header/branding labels.
          • titleLabel
            JLabel titleLabel
            Header/branding labels.
